alert.note: Alert for Guayanilla; Penuelas; Ponce; Sabana Grande; Yauco (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 27 at 10:10AM ADT until October 27 at 1:15PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Guayanilla County in Puerto Rico... Penuelas County in Puerto Rico... Ponce County in Puerto Rico... Sabana Grande County in Puerto Rico... Yauco County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1215 PM AST. * At 910 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms with heavy rain across the warned area. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 3 inches in 3 hours. Flash flooding is expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-3 INCHES IN 3 HOURS
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

area.areaDesc: Guayanilla; Penuelas; Ponce; Sabana Grande; Yauco
